entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 24. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
